text:
I'm glad Canada has (finally) publicly confirmed that it will donate surplus #COVID19 #vaccine.
But "Of course we will share any surplus" should have been the default public position from the start.
It should NOT be a "just last night the PM said" decision. That worries me.🇨🇦💉🌐 https://t.co/dmyXYDN8Oj https://t.co/HqbWrDsr2S
